attributes.action: review reasons for parole being granted to serious offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is requested that you review why serious offenders such as child murderers are given life sentences only to be released on parole a few years later, as too many of them are now going on to re-offend. It poses a serious threat to public safety.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
